players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I'm shocked by Diana's sudden death. We need to stay focused and work together to find out who among us could have done this."
You: "I agree with Charlie. We must all cooperate to uncover the truth behind Diana's death. Let us be vigilant and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
Bob: "I'm deeply saddened by Diana's death. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I suggest we all share our thoughts on what might have happened and look for any suspicious behavior."
Bob: "I noticed Alice went silent after we all agreed to share our thoughts. That seems suspicious to me - why wouldn't she want to contribute to finding Diana's killer?"
